experience.title: Data Scientist (promoted to Principal level - May 2021)
experience.description:
Data analysis, R and Python programming, data virtualization, Tableau and Shiny visualizations, analytics team co-lead,
                      SQL and Mongo querying, architecture and data engineering research, project planning, writeups, design mockups, and UX reviews.

experience.title: User Experience Analyst
experience.description: Perform remote usability testing on software prototypes, help with UI design, and develop and analyze survey data.

experience.title: Improving Open Source Software Development (Dissertation Topic)
experience.description:
Apply data mining in the development of algorithms and tools to improve developer understanding of technical
                        and social structure in large Open Source communities. Under direction of Dr. Judy Vance.

experience.title: Bimanual Haptics for Virtual Assembly Tasks (Research Assistant)
experience.description:
Designed and analyzed studies examining various bimanual haptic device configurations and learning transfer for
                      virtual assembly tasks. Under direction of Dr. Judy Vance.

experience.title: Mentor/Support Research Experience for Undergraduate (REU) Students
experience.description:
Helped coordinate three undergraduate REU students whose project entailed creating a physical mockup of a
                      shopping cart which was then used in a virtual reality user study. Under direction of Dr. Judy Vance.

experience.title: Research Experience for Undergraduates (REU)
experience.description:
Learned the basics of machine learning and worked on applying this to improving the routing of packets in a
                      dynamic network. Under direction of Dr. Terran Lane.

experience.title: Usability and Appeal of the Linux Desktop (Psychology Capstone)
experience.description:
Constructed and performed an experiment empirically contrasting usability and appeal of a 2D versus 3D Linux
                      desktop.

experience.title: Origins of Human Cooperation and Altruism
experience.description:
Simulated the evolution of cooperation/altruism using game theory techniques and genetic algorithms.
                      Presented work at Argonne National Laboratory.

experience.title: Student Technician
experience.description: Helped students and faculty connect to the Internet and troubleshoot network issues.

experience.title: Computer Technician
experience.description:
Conducted laptop repair and software setup for 60 freshman students. Imaged and configured multiple
                      computer labs.
